errorName.$comment: The name error object of type `SdkError` that will be returned from the host.
errorName.title: Error Name

returnValue.$comment: The data that will be returned from the host.
returnValue.title: Return Value

name.$comment: The name of the data object returned from the host

type.$comment: The type name of the data returned from the host

not.title: `any` and `unknown` are not legal return types

requiredForSuccess.$comment: If this is set to true and the data is not returned from the host the function will throw an exception

errorMessage.$comment: The error message that will be thrown if the data is not returned from the host

returnToCaller.$comment: If this is set to true this object will be passed back out to the function caller
